publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2716 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Further and Higher Education (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that, during Stage 3 of the Further and Higher Education (Scotland) Bill, debate on groups of amendments shall, subject to Rule 9.8.4A, be brought to a conclusion by the time-limits indicated (each time limit being calculated from when the Stage begins and excluding any periods when other business is under consideration or when the meeting of the Parliament is suspended or otherwise not in progress): Groups 1 and 2 – 1 hour and 10 minutes Group 3 – 1 hour and 20 minutes Groups 4 to 7 – 1 hour and 45 minutes Supported by: Tavish Scott*
